name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente. Saut√© garlic and red pepper flakes in olive oil until garlic is golden brown. Mix pasta with garlic oil. Garnish with fresh parsley and Parmesan cheese.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter the outside of the bread slices. Place cheese slices between the bread. Cook the sandwich in a skillet over medium heat until the bread is toasted and the cheese is melted.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice mozzarella and tomatoes. Arrange them on a plate, alternating with basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add wet ingredients and stir until smooth. Cook spoonfuls of batter on a griddle over medium heat until bubbles form on top. Flip and cook until golden brown. Serve with syrup.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Grill chicken until cooked through. Slice chicken and set aside. In a large bowl, toss romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing. Top with chicken slices, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
